5A1F4B4A.Line1.6D03F: The Prime Evils may be subdued, but they can never be ended. Even from their home in the Hells, they can still influence our world, walk it unseen.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: When weakened, theyâ€™ve been known to take the forms of strange animals: a one-eyed owl, a wingless bat, or a wounded wolf.
